# Foreword

This is the online appendix for the paper *"Roundtrip, free-floating and peer-to-peer carsharing: A Bayesian behavioral analysis"*. It contains a commented and reproducible code for all the analysis, tables and plots presented in the paper.

This appendix is compiled automatically and the following session information was used to generate this appendix:
